editor.cannot_sync: It's not supported to sync with cloud on the pure local mode.

login.email_verification_tip:
Verification code has been sent to {email}
Please remember to check out your junk/spam folder.

login.in_beta: Currently in beta testing, "Continue with {thirdParty}" is not available.
login.err_1: State is missing. Please try again later.
login.err_2: The email has been marked as spam, so look for it in the spam/promotion mailboxes.
login.err_3: The email has been rejected. Please replace your email address.
login.err_5: The error of state has occurred. Try to reload later.
login.err_6: The verification code is wrong or expired, or you operate too frequently.
login.err_7: Your email address is not in the list of authorized users.
login.err_8: There is no email address through the current login way.

tip.file_exceed_content: If you need more size, we recommand that you use a dedicated cloud service
tip.no_strange_char: There must be no strange characters in the tag
tip.tag_merge_content: Are you sure to merge "{tag1}" into "{tag2}"?
tip.not_join_bd: You haven't joined the workspace yet.
tip.workspace_different: There is deference between the current workspace and the workspace of the thread. Please switch to the corresponding workspace first.
tip.pin_maximum: The pin number has reached the maximum
tip.ir_content_1: Some websites do not support opening in the sidebar (iframe). If you are enable to open a webpage normally, you can tap
tip.delete_banner: The threads in the trash are only reserverd in these 30 days. They will be deleted permanently after 30 days.
tip.no_context: There is no workspace context. Please login again.
tip.maintaining_1: The backend service is currnetly under maintenance. Please try again later.
tip.err_1:
An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
(Code: {code})
tip.workspace_1: You have left from the workspace or the current workspace does not exist.
tip.workspace_2: You have left from the workspace.
tip.workspace_3: The current workspace does not exist.
tip.editing_bd: The system will also save the draft even if you cancel the update.
tip.open_with_browser_3: Tap "..." to open with the default browser
tip.cannot_remind_you: The system is unable to remind you because you has closed the sync to cloud.

setting.logout_bd: Are you sure to log out?

setting.logout_bd_3: It will delete all data. Are you sure?
setting.clear_cache_1: Are you sure to clear cache?
setting.select_avatar: Cropping is not supported yet. Crop by yourself and select it please!

export.take_time: It will take a little time. Are you sure?
export.highlight_tip: Considering perfomance of computers, we only support exporting the last {max} posts currnetly. We recommend that you export data regularly to keep your thoughts from time to time.

a2hs.title: Add to Home
a2hs.ipad_safari_1: 1. Tap "Share" button on the top right corner
a2hs.mobile_safari_2: 2. Swipe down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
a2hs.desktop_safari_1: 1. Click "Share" button on the top right corner
a2hs.tip_2: Record your life at your fingertips!
a2hs.fail_to_add_tip: Open Chrome browser and try again please.
a2hs.add_twice_title: Why do we need to log in twice?
a2hs.add_twice_desc_2: , the website and web app are different environments, which results in different browsing information from the two sides.
a2hs.recommand_desc: , the website and web app do not share login information. If you log in on the website and then install the web app, you need to log in again.
